"Slayer":
"Slayer is a Class which specializes in close-range, high-mobility combat, using their Gunslashes to perform a variety of attacks.

This tutorial explains some of the Class Skills you can learn."

"The Class Skill Gunslash Gear adds a Gear Gauge to the top of your Main Palette.

The Gear Gauge fills as you land attacks, raising your Gear level. At higher Gear levels, you gain reduced PP consumption, boosted attack power and increased attack PP recovery."

"The Class Skill Gunslash Gear Overdrive is an Active Skill which can be used when the Gear Gauge is at maximum. It consumes your entire Gear Gauge when activated. For a set time after activating it, you gain greatly reduced PP consumption, greatly boosted attack power and greatly increased attack PP recovery.

In addition, activating the Skill again while under its effects will perform a powerful finishing move."
